description: Smallest palindrome greater than n in bases n and n+1.
formula: a(n) = 2n^2+3n+2 for n >= 4 (which is (232) in base n and (1n1) in base (n+1).a(n) = A130883(n+1) for n > 3. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 08 2014
mathematica: Do[ k = n + 2; While[ RealDigits[ k, n + 1 ][ [ 1 ] ] != Reverse[ RealDigits[ k, n + 1 ][ [ 1 ] ] ] || RealDigits[ k, n ][ [ 1 ] ] != Reverse[ RealDigits[ k, n ][ [ 1 ] ] ], k++ ]; Print[ k ], {n, 2, 75} ]palQ[n_Integer, base_Integer] := Block[{idn = IntegerDigits[n, base]}, idn == Reverse[idn]]; f[n_] := Block[{k = n + 2}, While[ !palQ[k, n] || !palQ[k, n + 1], k++ ]; k]; Table[ f[n], {n, 2, 48}] (* _Robert G.
